sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import axios from 'axios' import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' // import { blogposts } from '../data.js' const Posts = ({ blogpost }) => { const [blogposts, setBlogposts] = useState() useEffect(() => { const fetchBlogposts = async () => { const { data } = await axios.get('/api/blogposts') setBlogposts(data) } fetchBlogposts() }) return (

Blog Posts:

Date:

Title:

Content:

 {blogposts && blogposts.reverse().map((blogpost) => (
{blogpost.date} {blogpost.name} {blogpost.content.substring(0, 15)}...{' '}
))}
) } export default Posts
